title: Murray Fraser appointed as General Editor of Sir Banister Fletcher’s Global History of Architecture, 21st ...
text: ( Source : University of London ) The 'all new' edition of this classic work takes on a revised title - Sir Banister Fletcher 's Global History of Architecture - and will be published in print and online formats by Bloomsbury Publishing in late
